net.java.dev.genesis.ui.swing
Class SwingBinder

java.lang.Object
  net.java.dev.genesis.ui.binding.AbstractBinder
      net.java.dev.genesis.ui.swing.SwingBinder
All Implemented Interfaces:
FormControllerListener
public class SwingBinder
extends AbstractBinder

SwingBinder is the default implementation of AbstractBinder for Swing. This class is used to connect a Swing Component to a form. Events generated by the Component are handled by SwingBinder and passed to the form. If the form state changes, SwingBinder will reflect that in Component.

Constructor Detail

SwingBinder

public SwingBinder(Component component,
                   Object form)
Constructs a new SwingBinder initialized with the component and the form. The component will act as a ViewHandler and all BeforeAction and AfterAction methods will be delegated to the component.

Parameters:
component - the component used in binding action
form - the form to be used
See Also:
AbstractBinder

registerComponentBinder

public WidgetBinder registerComponentBinder(String componentName,
                                            WidgetBinder binder)
Deprecated. Use registerWidgetBinder(String,WidgetBinder) instead

Associates the specified widget binder with the field with the specified name. Use this to register a custom component binder to a specified field.

Parameters:
componentName - the name with which the specified component binder is to be associated.
binder - the component binder to be associated with the specified name.
Returns:
previous component associated with specified name, or null if none.

registerButtonGroup

public ButtonGroup registerButtonGroup(String name,
                                       ButtonGroup buttonGroup)
Associates the specified ButtonGroup with the field with the specified name. Use this to bind ButtonGroups.

Parameters:
name - the name with which the specified ButtonGroup is to be associated.
buttonGroup - the ButtonGroup to be associated with the specified name.
Returns:
the buttonGroup.

registerButtonGroup

public ButtonGroup registerButtonGroup(String name,
                                       ButtonGroup buttonGroup,
                                       GroupBinder groupBinder)
Associates the specified ButtonGroup with the field with the specified name and with the GroupBinder to use in this association. Use this to bind ButtonGroups.

Parameters:
name - the name with which the specified ButtonGroup is to be associated.
buttonGroup - the ButtonGroup to be associated with the specified name.
groupBinder - the specified GroupBinder to use
Returns:
the buttonGroup.

bind

public void bind()
Method that does the bind. It will look in the form and associate fields, actions and dataproviders with components in the UI. This method should be the last one used by a binder.

Overrides:
bind in class AbstractBinder
